ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Shrouds???
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night I tried an LDoN as the Gargoyle (lvl20) shroud and discovered the following: 1. I could not equip any of the weaponry. 2. Have the shrouded one
ygData.messageBody:
Last night I tried an LDoN as the Gargoyle (lvl20) shroud and discovered
the following:

1. I could not equip any of the weaponry.
2. Have the shrouded one collect.

I say have the shrouded one collect simply because after you finish and
they go sell the stuff to get extra cash and then do the split, have
everyone meet over in PoK and the shrouded one drop his/her shroud and
then they access their shroud bank, all the stuff is still in there!
(except for the cash I believe.) Go sell the stuff again and do another
split. I'm sure it's a bug and Sony will catch it eventually and spoil
it but take advantage of it while you can!

Later!
Durgaa

>Message: 1

>equip a shield to do that
